casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Fred C. SINK. No. 347P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 10, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 631 S.E.2d 16.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of July 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of July 2006."
